get.description: Get a map that is centered at a specified point

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: BingMapsAPIKey

parameters.name: centerPoint
parameters.description: A point on the Earth where the map is centered.

parameters.name: declutterPins
parameters.description: Specifies whether to change the display of overlapping pushpins so that they display separately on a map.

parameters.name: dpi
parameters.description: Specifies the resolution of the labels on the image to retrieve.

parameters.name: drawCurve
parameters.description: Used to insert lines, curves, circles, and polygons over an image.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The image format to use for the static map.

parameters.name: heading
parameters.description: Desired camera heading in degrees, clockwise from north.

parameters.name: imagerySet
parameters.description: The type of imagery.

parameters.name: mapArea
parameters.description: The geographic area to display on the map.

parameters.name: mapLayer
parameters.description: A display layer that renders on top of the imagery set.

parameters.name: mapSize
parameters.description: The width and height in pixels of the static map output.

parameters.name: mapMetadata
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return metadata for the static map instead of the image.

parameters.name: pitch
parameters.description: Controls the camera pitch angle.

parameters.name: orientation
parameters.description: The orientation of view for Bird's Eye imagery.

parameters.name: pushpin
parameters.description: One or more pushpin locations to display on the map.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: A query string that is used to determine the map location to display.

parameters.name: zoomLevel
parameters.description: The level of zoom to display.

parameters.name: fieldOfView
parameters.description: Specifies the horizontal field of view in degrees that should be shown in the image. Either 'fieldOfView' or 'zoomLevel' should be specified, not both.

parameters.name: highlightEntity
parameters.description: Highlights a polygon for an entity.

parameters.name: style
parameters.description: Specifies a custom map style to apply to the road maps.

200.description: Get a map that is centered at a specified point

get.description: Get a map that shows a specified map area

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: BingMapsAPIKey

parameters.name: declutterPins
parameters.description: Specifies whether to change the display of overlapping pushpins so that they display separately on a map.

parameters.name: dpi

200.description: Get a map that shows a specified map area

get.description: Get a map that is centered at the specified point and that displays a route

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: BingMapsAPIKey

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The image format to use for the static map.

parameters.name: centerPoint
parameters.description: A point on the Earth where the map is centered.

parameters.name: avoid
parameters.description: Specifies the road types to minimize or avoid when the route is created for the driving travel mode.

parameters.name: distanceBeforeFirstTurn
parameters.description: Specifies the distance before the first turn is allowed in the route. if travelMode is Driving, distanceBeforeFirstTurn is required

parameters.name: dateTime
parameters.description: The timeType parameter identifies the desired transit time, such as arrival time or departure time. if travelMode is Transit, dateTime is required

parameters.name: maxSolutions
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of transit routes to return. if travelMode is Transit or Driving, maxSolutions is required

parameters.name: optimize
parameters.description: Specifies what parameters to use to optimize the route on the map.

parameters.name: imagerySet
parameters.description: The type of imagery.

parameters.name: timeType
parameters.description: Specifies how to interpret the date and transit time value that is specified by the dateTime parameter. if travelMode is Transit, timeType is required

parameters.name: travelMode
parameters.description: The mode of travel for the route.

parameters.name: waypoint.0
parameters.description: Specifies two or more locations that define the route and that are in sequential order

parameters.name: waypoint.1
parameters.description: Specifies two or more locations that define the route and that are in sequential order

parameters.name: zoomLevel
parameters.description: The level of zoom to display.

parameters.name: pushpin
parameters.description: One or more pushpin locations to display on the map.

parameters.name: mapArea
parameters.description: The geographic area to display on the map.

parameters.name: mapLayer
parameters.description: A display layer that renders on top of the imagery set.

parameters.name: mapSize
parameters.description: The width and height in pixels of the static map output.

parameters.name: mapMetadata
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return metadata for the static map instead of the image.

200.description: Get a map that shows a specified map area

200.description: Get a map that shows a specified map area

get.description: Make a Local Search API request based on a string query by specifying a user location.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: BingMapsAPIKey

parameters.name: imagerySet
parameters.description: The type of imagery for which you are requesting metadata.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specifies to provide additional information about the imagery as part of the response.

parameters.name: orientation
parameters.description: The orientation of the viewport to use for the imagery metadata. if imagerySet is Birdseye, orientation is required

parameters.name: uriScheme
parameters.description: Specifies the scheme that image URL in the response should use.

parameters.name: mapLayer
parameters.description: A display layer that renders on top of the imagery set.

get.description: Make a Local Search API request based on a string query by specifying a user location.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: BingMapsAPIKey

parameters.name: imagerySet
parameters.description: The type of imagery for which you are requesting metadata.

parameters.name: centerPoint
parameters.description: if imagerySet is Birdseye, BirdseyeWithLabels, or Streetside, centerPoint is required. The center point to use for the imagery metadata.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specifies to provide additional information about the imagery as part of the response.

parameters.name: orientation
parameters.description: The orientation of the viewport to use for the imagery metadata. if imagerySet is Birdseye, orientation is required

parameters.name: uriScheme
parameters.description: Specifies the scheme that image URL in the response should use.

parameters.name: zoomLevel
parameters.description: The level of zoom to use for the imagery metadata. if imagerySet is Road, Aerial, or AerialWithLabels, zoomLevel is required

parameters.name: mapLayer
parameters.description: A display layer that renders on top of the imagery set.
